ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Base ` S ) = ( Base ` S ) |
| 2 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Base ` T ) = ( Base ` T ) |
| 3 | 1, 2 | #P_lmhmf | |- ( F e. ( S LMHom T ) -> F : ( Base ` S ) --> ( Base ` T ) ) |
| 4 |  | #P_frel | |- ( F : ( Base ` S ) --> ( Base ` T ) -> Rel F ) |
| 5 | 3, 4 | #P_syl | |- ( F e. ( S LMHom T ) -> Rel F ) |
| 6 |  | #P_dfrel2 | |- ( Rel F <-> `' `' F = F ) |
| 7 | 5, 6 | #P_sylib | |- ( F e. ( S LMHom T ) -> `' `' F = F ) |
| 8 |  | #P_id | |- ( F e. ( S LMHom T ) -> F e. ( S LMHom T ) ) |
| 9 | 7, 8 | #P_eqeltrd | |- ( F e. ( S LMHom T ) -> `' `' F e. ( S LMHom T ) ) |
| 10 | 9 | #P_anim2i | |- ( ( `' F e. ( T LMHom S ) /\ F e. ( S LMHom T ) ) -> ( `' F e. ( T LMHom S ) /\ `' `' F e. ( S LMHom T ) ) ) |
| 11 | 10 | #P_ancoms | |- ( ( F e. ( S LMHom T ) /\ `' F e. ( T LMHom S ) ) -> ( `' F e. ( T LMHom S ) /\ `' `' F e. ( S LMHom T ) ) ) |
| 12 |  | #P_islmim2 | |- ( F e. ( S LMIso T ) <-> ( F e. ( S LMHom T ) /\ `' F e. ( T LMHom S ) ) ) |
| 13 |  | #P_islmim2 | |- ( `' F e. ( T LMIso S ) <-> ( `' F e. ( T LMHom S ) /\ `' `' F e. ( S LMHom T ) ) ) |
